https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pbCyT7bKFkTZyQp8Jmacs2wpH86.jpg In the 70s, actress Delphine Seyrig and director Carole Roussopoulos, both militant feminists, were the pioneers of video activism in France. They documented the demonstrations of French feminists and used the new technologies to counter the poor representation of women in the public media. Delphine and Carole
